extends java.lang.Object

      • removePromotionSet

        public boolean removePromotionSet(java.lang.Integer promotionSetID)
        Remove a promotion set order.
        Parameters:
        promotionSetID - The id of the set that wants to be removed.
        Returns:
        False if the specified item is not in the order, otherwise Yes

      • removeMenuItem

        public boolean removeMenuItem(java.lang.Integer menuItemID)
        Remove a menu item order.
        Parameters:
        menuItemID - the id of the menu that wants to be removed.
        Returns:

      • print

        public void print(Menu menu,
                  PromoSet promoSet)
        Print the order details. The reservation, and all item ordered are listed out by this method.
        Parameters:
        menu - The class which contains id of all menu item.
        promoSet - The class which contains id of all set item.

      • printInvoice

        public void printInvoice(Menu menu,
                         PromoSet promoSet,
                         Rev_rep_list rev_rep_list)
        Print the order details, calculate the total, then append to the report list.
        Parameters:
        menu - The class which contains id of all menu items.
        promoSet - The class which contains id of all set items.
        rev_rep_list - The class which contains all the reports.
